Fix mobile layout and move Claude logo to top-right
commits.body: - Move "Enhanced by Claude" logo to top-right corner

commits.message: Add mobile touch support and distance-based cancel mechanism
commits.body: - Add touchstart, touchmove, touchend event handling

commits.message: Fix drag merge functionality and add debug logging
commits.body: - Fix event listener duplication by moving global events to init

commits.message: Remove new game button - cleaner interface
commits.body: - Remove unnecessary new game button for streamlined UI

commits.message: Implement drag-to-connect gameplay with visual connections
commits.body: - Replace click selection with mouse drag interaction

commits.message: Add color-coded tiles for each number value
commits.body: - Each number (2, 4, 8, 16, etc.) has unique color scheme

commits.message: Enforce strict sequential power-of-2 connection rules
commits.body: - Only allow same numbers or consecutive 2x multipliers

commits.message: Implement power-of-2 merge calculation with ceiling
commits.body: - All merge results are powers of 2

commits.message: Fix merge target position - merged number appears in last selected cell
commits.body: - Change merge target from first to last selected cell

commits.message: Fix connection rules - only allow same numbers or sequential multiples
commits.body: - Allow: 2+2+2, 2+2+4 (sequential increase)

commits.message: Implement merge-based gameplay with enhanced rules
commits.body: - Numbers now merge instead of disappearing

commits.message: Update 2248 game rules - enhanced connection logic and game end detection
commits.body: - Support 8-directional linking (including diagonals) for same numbers or multiples

commits.message: Add Claude logo to 2248 game page and setup GitHub Contributors
commits.body: - Add Enhanced by Claude logo to 2248 game page

commits.message: Add Enhanced by Claude logo to bottom right corner
commits.body: ğŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.ai/code)

commits.message: Reorganize files for cleaner URLs
commits.body: - Move 2248-game.html to 2248/index.html for clean URL structure

commits.message: Add homepage for GitHub Pages
commits.body: - Created index.html as landing page

commits.message: Add 2248 HTML5 game
commits.body: - Implemented 5x7 grid puzzle game
